sentence.Network_en: The radiation was filtered either by borosilicate glass or by quartz.
sentence.Network_cn: 辐射光源或用硼硅酸盐玻璃或用石英过滤.

sentence.Network_en: The borosilicate glass polished 300 s, and then can attain perfect polishing result.
sentence.Network_cn: 1250℃硼硅酸盐玻璃抛光300s, 就可以达到理想的抛光效果.

sentence.Network_en: Semiprecious gemstones, tourmalines belong to a family of borosilicate minerals.
sentence.Network_cn: 准宝石的是经过雕刻的宝石, 电器石属于硼硅酸盐矿石的家族.
